attributes.action: Review the price of crossing the M4 and M48 Severn Bridges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every year we have to count the cost of crossing the Severn Bridges, Every year with out fail they increase 20 pence!! in the climate we are in at the moment it is unfair that the cost of crossing the Severn Bridge is going to be £5.50, Most people need to cross the bridge to go to employement, This is costing us £27.50 a week which is £1430 a year!! with the cost of living going up this is too expensive..
